knowledge: Jonathan Stark (born April 3, 1971) is a former professional tennis player from the United States. knowledge: The 2013 Liqui Moly Bathurst 12 Hour was an endurance race for a variety of GT and touring car classes, including: GT3 cars, GT4 cars, Group 3E Series Production Cars and Dubai 24 Hour cars.
